title: STAT+: CMS divvies up first payments from $50B rural health fund, with an eye toward MAHA goals
description: The Trump administration on Monday announced the distribution of the first payments from a new $50 billion rural health fund — but not all states are getting equal payouts.
content: The Trump administration on Monday announced the distribution of the first payments from a new $50 billion rural health fund — but not all states are getting equal payouts.
